Celebrate Canada Day in Ottawa with vari: Celebrate Canada Day in Ottawa with various events throughout the city, including live music, performances, and a grand fireworks display at night.
The National Arts Centre (NAC) presents: The National Arts Centre (NAC) presents a variety of performing arts on its four stages, including dance, English and French theatre, variety shows, and performances for young audiences.
The Ottawa Jazz Festival is an annual mu: The Ottawa Jazz Festival is an annual music festival that features a wide array of international jazz talent. The event offers something for everyone with performances from renowned jazz musicians, as well as up-and-coming artists.
This exhibition presents a range of cont: This exhibition presents a range of contemporary sculptures by national and international artists. Experience the diversity and creativity in contemporary sculpture.
Explore the stunning photography exhibit: Explore the stunning photography exhibition at the Ottawa Art Gallery, featuring works from acclaimed photographers around the world.
The Ottawa Art Gallery (OAG) is a munici: The Ottawa Art Gallery (OAG) is a municipal gallery in Ottawa that exhibits works of art by local, national, and international artists. The gallery focuses on growing the understanding and appreciation of art and artists in Ottawa
